pages.text: The $(l:collecting/altar)Natural Altar$() can be useful for infusing certain items with the power of $(aura), however, it can also assist in transmuting items from one type into another.$(br)This can be achieved by creating the $(item)Transmutation Catalyst$() and placing it on top of any of the four lower $(item)Golden Stone Brick$() blocks around the altar, and then placing the ingredient on the altar as usual.
Creating the $(item)Transmutation Catalyst$() using the $(l:practices/tree_ritual)Ritual of the Forest$().
Creating $(item)Dragon's Breath$() out of the end's $(aura)
Making $(item)Soul Sand$() out of worldly grains
Conjuring $(item)Prismarine Shards$() from the nether's ore
Causing $(thing)water$() to accumulate inside an empty $(item)bottle$()
